abstract: Chemical factory explosion in China's Shandong Province kills one and injures at least nine; blast increases anxiety about China’s expanding chemical industry and lax regulatory enforcement.
lead_paragraph: The explosion on Saturday, which tore through a chemical plant in Zibo, Shandong Province, also injured at least nine people.

headline.main: One Killed in Explosion at China Chemical Site
headline.print_headline: One Killed in Explosion at China Chemical Site

snippet: The explosion on Saturday, which tore through a chemical plant in Zibo, Shandong Province, also injured at least nine people.
